ModMetaData.name: Custom Alerts - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: Uuugggg
ModMetaData.description: Alert when customizable filters find things on the map (This is the dev version of Custom Alerts. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
